channel.title: Is patcher free?
channel.description: I'm extremely interested in an axoloti core. I've been creating some effects in reactor and I would like to recreate them in axoloti patcher. It would allow me to create a few hardware effects units for my guitars and synths. Is there anyway to get the Patcher software for free so I can insure that I can create what I want with it before diving in and buying the core?

item.title: Is patcher free?
item.dc:creator: @toneburst alx
item.description:
@toneburst wrote:

The patcher is free, but doesn't make any sound Without the Axoloti Core hardware. You can check out the UI, and the selection of objects in the library, though.

Get it here:

github.com

axoloti/axoloti

axoloti - Sketching embedded digital audio

a|x

Read full topic
